attributes.action: Let all persons riding motorcycles ignore national speed limits!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As bikes are so fast and powerful these days it seems a shame to only be legally allowed to ride them at 70Mph.. I mean honestly! How slow is THAT??? We should be able to ride them as fast as we want in all national speed limit areas!! (It's not like we don't anyway after all!) We will only kill ourselves if we screw up, and it would save police resources not having to keep chasing us all the time!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
